name: Like A Rouge
description:
(Like A Rouge) a game about attacking and surviving the incoming attack from various creatures and monsters, using different kinds of upgradeable abilities and primary, survive as long as you can.

Controls:
E Button -> Player Ability
M1 or Mouse Button 1 -> Player Primary

Movement:
W and Up Arrow Key-> Move Up
A and Left Arrow Key-> Move Left
S and Down Arrow Key-> Move Down
D and Right Arrow Key-> Move Right
